attributes.action: Honour Peter Kay And Patrick McGuiness MBE's For Services To Comedy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Peter Kay And Patrick McGuiness are the best two comedians inthe world. Together they have made great comedy tv shows like 'Phoenix Nights' and 'Max and Paddy's Road To Nowhere'. Also the have starred in 'That Peter Kay Thing'. 
They are also great live comedians i have seeen both live and i would advise anybody who likes comedy to go see them or watch their tv shows
